mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.supplier_name AS "supplierName", a.supplier_code AS "supplierCode"
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM archive_supplier a
AND a.supplier_code LIKE '%'||#{supplierCode}||'%' '%'+#{supplierCode}+'%' CONCAT('%', #{supplierCode}, '%')
AND a.supplier_name LIKE '%'||#{supplierName}||'%' '%'+#{supplierName}+'%' CONCAT('%', #{supplierName}, '%')
ORDER BY ${page.orderBy}
